vsParam:
Now that you have seen lots of items...
What do you think, Nelke?

Hehe, it's really interesting. Similarities between different worlds,
and differences within the same world...

I feel like that I'm finally getting to know the essence of
alchemy. But I still don't think I could practice it...

Haha...
Indeed, alchemy is particular about its users...

For example, the one I practice "Antique" alchemy,
which is almost unknown to anyone else...

Never mind.
You'll get better at it if you keep trying!

Oh, right!
Many people are learning "Modern" alchemy...

Oh? So many people are learning alchemy...
Rorona Sensei said no one except me... Oh, forget it.

Ahem! Do not broach this perilous topic! Let's start
the next assignment of "Peppermint's Alchemy Dojo"!

Yeah, as a qualified alchemist, your eyes should
be able to tell good ingredients from bad!

Right. Because we can't synthesize anything
without ingredients.

Yeah, but how are we supposed to finish the assignment?
Nelke is powerful, but to do this alone is a bit...

Yeah, don't worry about that!
I've got us a great helper! Hey...

Coming! I'm Helper A, Wilbell! I immediately came here
on hearing Master Peppermint's summoning!

I'm H-Helper B... Sterk.
At your service... Master Peppermint... Hmm.

Oh——Come on, don't be so stiff~ Sterk!
You should be brisk and neat now!

Hmm, even so...
I'm not good at this...
Haha. Anyway... my helpers are Wilbell and Sterk!

They will be your guardians. Nelke, try your best to learn
how to distinguish ingredients from [px]!
I'll try my best to teach her!
I may not be able to teach her...

Wow~ I'm so looking forward to it!
I want to join you too~

No way. Escha, you and Totori have other work to do!
So... please stay at home!

Got it...
See you... Guys, have a safe trip!

Thank you, Totori.
So, let's go!
